column6: Qatar Energy operates in the oil and gas industry in Qatar. The company engages in the exploration, drilling, marketing and sale of crude oil, liquefied natural gas and refined products. The company, formerly known as Qatar General Petroleum Corporation, was founded in 1974 and is based in Doha, Qatar. As of 11 October 2021, the company has changed its name to Qatar Energy.

Triton Minerals Limited primarily engages in the evaluation, exploration, and development of mineral resources, primarily graphite in Mozambique. It primarily holds seven exploration licenses comprising three project areas, which include the Ancuabe project, the Balama North project, and the Balama South project located in the Cabo Delgado Province of northern Mozambique. The company was formerly known as Triton Gold Limited and changed its name to Triton Minerals Limited in February 2013. Triton Minerals Limited was founded in 2006 and is based in West Perth, Australia.

Anheuser-Busch InBev, also known as Ab InBev, is a brewing company. It engages in the production, marketing, and distribution of beer in Latin America, North America, Europe and Asia-Pacific. It offers a portfolio of approximately 200 beer brands. The company's global brands include Budweiser, Stella Artois, and Beck's; multi-country brands consist of Leffe and Hoegaarden; and local brands comprise Bud Light, Michelob, Skol, Brahma, Antarctica, Quilmes, Jupiler, Hasseroder, Klinskoye, Sibirskaya Korona, Chernigivske, Harbin and Sedrin. Established in 1366, the company is headquartered in Leuven, Belgium.
column36: "The facility will also help AB InBev keep pace with demand in a market that saw growth over more than 20% in the first half of this year," said Ricardo Tadeu, president of the African zone.

column6: Galp Energia engages in the exploration and production of petroleum and natural gas, as well as the refining and distribution of petroleum products. The company engages in the exploration, development and production of hydrocarbons primarily in Angola, Brazil, Mozambique and East Timor. Galp Energia was founded in 1999 and is based in Lisbon, Portugal.

Galp Energia engages in the exploration and production of petroleum and natural gas, as well as the refining and distribution of petroleum products. The company engages in the exploration, development and production of hydrocarbons primarily in Angola, Brazil, Mozambique and East Timor. Galp Energia was founded in 1999 and is based in Lisbon, Portugal.

Exxon Mobil through its divisions and affiliates is engaged in the exploration for, and production of, crude oil and natural gas. The company also manufactures petroleum products; manufactures and markets commodity petrochemicals, including olefins, aromatics, polyethylene, and polypropylene plastics, as well as various specialty products; and transports and sells crude oil, natural gas, and petroleum products. The company operates in three segments: upstream, downstream and chemicals. Exxon Mobil was founded in 1999 and is based in Irving, Texas, US. Exxon Mobil also operates as ExxonMobil. In February 2022, the company announced that it is moving its headquarters from Irving to Houston, Texas.
Pure Diets engages in the manufacture and distribution of sugar, molasses, refined spirts and alcohol and mango puree. The company was established in 2006 and is headquartered in New Dehli, India.
Walmart is a multinational retail firm that operates hypermarkets, discount department stores, and grocery stores. Walmart was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Bentonville, Arkansas, US.
column27: Building material & garden equipment & supplies dealers (Consumer products)

column6: Carrick Wealth specialises in wealth and capital management services. The company aims to help its customers preserve, protect and grow their wealth by offering a range of advisory services. Carrick Wealth was established in 2014 and is headquartered in Cape Town, South Africa.
Walmart is a multinational retail firm that operates hypermarkets, discount department stores, and grocery stores. Walmart was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Bentonville, Arkansas, US.

Dentsu, together with its subsidiaries, provides promotional and communication services in Japan and internationally. Its advertising segment offers advertising strategy planning and related creative services; and assistance in the placement of advertisements in various media. Dentsu was founded in 1901 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

Banco Comercial Portugues (Millennium BCP) together with its subsidiaries, provides various banking and financial products and services. The company offers a range of financial products and services, including current accounts, payment systems, savings and investment products, and private banking services; and asset management and investment banking services, such as mortgage loans, consumer credit, commercial banking, leasing, factoring and insurance, and others, as well as personal, mortgage, and automobile loans. It was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Porto, Portugal.

The company offers a range of financial products and services, including current accounts, payment systems, savings and investment products, and private banking services; and asset management and investment banking services, such as mortgage loans, consumer credit, commercial banking, leasing, factoring and insurance, and others, as well as personal, mortgage, and automobile loans. It was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Porto, Portugal.

It was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Porto, Portugal.

Essar, through its subsidiaries, engages in steel, oil and gas, power, infrastructure, shipping, business process outsourcing (BPO), telecom, and real estate businesses in Asia, Africa, Europe, the Americas and Australia. The company's operations also include managing ports and providing port and terminal services for liquid, dry bulk, break bulk and general cargo; and handling engineering, procurement and construction projects for steel, oil and gas, power and ports and terminals. Essar was founded in 1969 and is based in Mumbai, India. As of October 2018, it is a subsidiary of Arcelormittal.
